pr_title: #29222: Partner: Set automatically the siren and nic from registratio…

timeline.message: #29222: Partner: Set automatically the siren and nic from registration code

timeline.bodyText: why add a onChange on a readonly field ?
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -347,13 +347,11 @@
 				<field name="functionBusinessCard" showIf="isContact || partnerTypeSelect == 2" />
 			</panel>
 			<panel name="otherPartnerDetailsPanel">
-				<field name="siren" hideIf="partnerTypeSelect== 2" colSpan="4"
-					onChange="action-partner-record-set-registration-code" />
-				<field name="nic" hideIf="partnerTypeSelect== 2" colSpan="4"
-					onChange="action-partner-record-set-registration-code" />
-				<field name="registrationCode" hideIf="partnerTypeSelect== 2"
-					readonly="true" colSpan="4"
+				<field name="registrationCode" hideIf="partnerTypeSelect== 2" colSpan="4"
 					onChange="action-method-partner-registration-code-onChange" />
+				<field name="siren" hideIf="partnerTypeSelect== 2" colSpan="4" readonly="true" />
+				<field name="nic" hideIf="partnerTypeSelect== 2" colSpan="4" readonly="true"
